item.description:
This will be the 2nd Annual 2-day "Intro to Permaculture Workshop" held in the greater Portland area and taught by Charles and Julia Yelton of Humastacia Permaculture Gardens in Whitefield (freshly back from Cyprus).

[NOTE: I will be sending final workshop details out to attendees over the weekend of May 4th - what to bring, etc. Thanks! -- Lisa]


Here is the full event flyer to print and/or post around town:
http://files.meetup.c...

This promises to be an incredible learning experience with lots of hands-on, potlucking and community building. Last year's 2-day workshop was a huge success. Plus this year the workshop will be at Tom/Lee/Kira's new home in Gorham which is in the process of becoming LEED certified!

Note that there are price concessions for students/seniors/and early registration in general.
**Payment Instructions** To hold your spot in this workshop: 1) RSVP here on this site and 2) send a check or money order payable to Charles & Julia Yelton, c/o 1002 Sawyer Road, Cape Elizabeth ME 04107.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: 2-Day Intro to Permaculture Workshop
